archimate:Requirement.name: NC.1.2.4: Network documentation (e.g. labels, diagrams, inventories and schedules) should clearly identify high-risk environments and data flows that could lead to significant business impact should they be compromised.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
